name: agency-aestro-template-page
title: Agency Aestro Template Page
desc: This Aestro template offers a sleek layout and polished animations that enhance the user's browsing experience.
article:
This Aestro template offers a sleek layout and polished animations that enhance the user's browsing experience. It also comes with a variety of pre-designed components for easy use.


Short description of features:

  • RWD
  • SEO friendly
  • Animations
  • Form validation & api connected 
  • Best possible performance
  • Typescript
  • React components
  • mobile friendly


Easy to customize


All blocks was created with React and Typescript and all functionality is setup by astro.build

This means that even if you dont like astro, you can copy blocks from this project and easly use it with other languages like next.js!

Pages Ready to use

Template have few pages ready to use:

  • Homepage
  • Our offers
  • About
  • contact page


more informations you can find in our store
